alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 8:45PM CDT until August 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CAMERON AND SOUTH CENTRAL CALCASIEU PARISHES... At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Charles Regional Airport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grand Chenier, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Sweet Lake, Gibbstown, and Hacketts Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
